text: that new login screen is so unnecessary tbh, why should I write my email to select the google login when with the older solution I can just click google and it's all set?

Hi there,
I am updating some of my images using scrsets and the `resize_image_url` function, but im running into an issue that i need to reinsert the image before its correctly applied. is there anyway to force this to refresh or something instead of having to go to *all* pages and manually reinserting this. Check thread for code :slightly_smiling_face:

Hubl:
```<img data-speed="4" class="banner-background-image {% if module.parallax_effect %}hero__parallax{% endif %}" 
                    srcset="{{ resize_image_url(item.background_image.src, 480) }} 480w,
                            {{ resize_image_url(item.background_image.src, 768) }} 768w,
                            {{ resize_image_url(item.background_image.src, 1024) }} 1024w,
                            {{ resize_image_url(item.background_image.src, 1280) }} 1280w,
                            {{ resize_image_url(item.background_image.src, 1600) }} 1600w,
                            {{ resize_image_url(item.background_image.src, 1920) }} 1920w,
                            {{ resize_image_url(item.background_image.src, 2560) }} 2560w,
                            {{ resize_image_url(item.background_image.src, 3840) }} 3840w"
                             
                   sizes="100vw"
                   src="{{ item.background_image.src }}"
                   alt="{{ item.background_image.alt }}"
                   width="{{ item.background_image.width }}"
                   height="{{ item.background_image.height }}"
                   {{ loadingAttr }}>```
Returned code:
```<img data-speed="4" class="banner-background-image hero__parallax" srcset="<https://www.xsens.com/hubfs/homeherobase.jpg> 480w, <https://www.xsens.com/hubfs/homeherobase.jpg> 768w, <https://www.xsens.com/hubfs/homeherobase.jpg> 1024w, <https://www.xsens.com/hubfs/homeherobase.jpg> 1280w, <https://www.xsens.com/hubfs/homeherobase.jpg> 1600w, <https://www.xsens.com/hubfs/homeherobase.jpg> 1920w, <https://www.xsens.com/hubfs/homeherobase.jpg> 2560w, <https://www.xsens.com/hubfs/homeherobase.jpg> 3840w" sizes="100vw" src="<https://www.xsens.com/hubfs/homeherobase.jpg>" alt="homeherobase" width="2600" height="1600" loading="eager">```
Does anyone know which countries are not allowed to call from HubSpot?
You definitely don't need to re add the images. My guess is the page is cached. Try adding ?hsCacheBuster=1273818383 to a urll
